title: Assumed Video Lag On Kill
body:
For a while now I've been getting occasional (what I assume to be) video lag whenever a member of either team dies. It generally lasts about a second or two, but as we all know, that can mean the difference between life or death in League of Legends. The worst is when it's during a teamfight as you can well imagine.

I'm not sure if it's specifically because someone dies, but it seems to be triggered by some sort of global event happening, i.e. someone dying, a turret going down, a dragon dying, etc.

I've ruled out latency issues because again this only happens SPECIFICALLY when something happens during the game and not just at random times. Also, when it does happen, I am still able to move my mouse around my frozen screen for the brief period that the game is lagged out.

I also don't believe it's my rig, as it's built to handle much more intensive games. I'll post specs just for kicks.

I've also tried the repair function or whatever and also completely uninstalled, ran CCleaner, and reinstalled to no avail.

Any help would be appreciated.

Windows 10 64-bit
Intel i5-4690K @ 3.50 GHz
16 GB Ram
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970

replies.body:
It sounds like your game is experiencing stutters or delays in displaying game assets. This can be very problematic as it can cause you to miss actions, as you've mentioned or even crash your client. There are a lot of potential causes, however, our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) goes over the most common solutions. 

If you should still see these issues after taking the steps in the guide, please let me know.

Sometimes when someone dies or there is a double / triple kill in the other part of the map i have a micro stutter, i think its audio related but not completely sure (won't play wihtout audio, and isn't a big issue, but its noticeable) I already try some things like reinstalling , move the game on ssd ... but still happen

i can handle more intensive games without any issue... just lol have some strange problem :D

its not frame skipping... i have frame skip with fps uncapped XD 

its a micro stuttering... like a 0.1ms freeze with a minor fps drop just when someone die but not always especialy when there is a multi kill for this i think its related to announcer voice.

Sounds like you may have some corrupt files on your hand. 

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
